mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Kaza.Store, we believe that fashion is more than just clothing—it's a form of self-expression. Our mission is to curate the finest fashion brands and bring them to the modern Egyptian woman, making luxury accessible and style effortless.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a future where every woman in Egypt has access to quality fashion that reflects her unique style and personality. Through carefully selected collections and exceptional service, we aim to become the premier destination for fashion in Egypt.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We handpick every brand and product to ensure the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We celebrate genuine style and authentic self-expression, supporting brands that share our values.

service.title: Exceptional Service
service.description: Your satisfaction is our priority. We're committed to providing an unparalleled shopping experience.

q1.question: What are your shipping options?
q1.answer: We offer standard shipping (5-7 business days) and express shipping (2-3 business days). Free standard shipping is available on orders over EGP 500.

q2.question: How long does delivery take?
q2.answer: Standard delivery takes 5-7 business days, while express delivery takes 2-3 business days. Orders placed before 10 PM are processed the next morning.

q3.question: Do you ship internationally?
q3.answer: Currently, we only ship within Egypt. We're working on expanding our shipping options to other countries.

q1.question: What is your return policy?
q1.answer: You can return items within 30 days of purchase, provided they are unworn, unwashed, and in their original packaging with tags attached.

q2.question: How do I return an item?
q2.answer: To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team or visit the Returns page. We'll provide you with a return label and instructions.

q3.question: How long do refunds take?
q3.answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your returned item. The amount will be credited back to your original payment method.

q1.question: How can I track my order?
q1.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your order on our Track Order page using your order number.

q2.question: Can I modify or cancel my order?
q2.answer: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 2 hours of placement. After that, please contact customer service for assistance.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and cash on delivery for orders within Egypt.

q1.question: How do I know my size?
q1.answer: Each product page includes detailed size charts and fit information. If you're unsure, our customer service team can help you find the perfect fit.

q2.question: Are products authentic?
q2.answer: Yes, all our products are 100% authentic. We work directly with authorized retailers and brands to ensure authenticity.

q3.question: What if an item is out of stock?
q3.answer: If an item is out of stock, you can sign up for restock notifications. We'll email you as soon as the item becomes available again.
